turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hey, I'm looking for some movie recommendations. I'm in the mood for something... thrilling. Maybe suspenseful? I don't know, something that will keep me on the edge of my seat.

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Okay! I understand. For thrilling and suspenseful movies, I would recommend 'Prisoners', 'Parasite', or 'Se7en'. Have you seen any of those?

turns.speaker: user
turns.utterance: Hmm, I've seen Se7en, great movie. Prisoners sounds familiar, but Parasite isn't really my thing. Anything else? I'm not really into foreign films, to be honest. Are there any thrillers that have a similar feel to Se7en, but maybe a bit less...dark?

turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: If you liked 'Se7en' and want something less dark, you might enjoy 'Zodiac' or 'The Silence of the Lambs'. Both are crime thrillers with a strong investigative element but perhaps a slightly lighter tone than 'Se7en'. What do you think?

turns.speaker: user
